posts.post_content:
I don't collect Ts, so I'm looking to move it. It's got a spider wrinkle on the right side of the card about where the shirt sleeve shows to be black. So I'd say this is probably VG. I'm looking to sell/trade it. Willing to trade for 1960s-early 1970s stars and HOFers. Or I'd consider selling for $45 shipped F/F. A VG-VG-Ex went for $100, while a VG went for $55. Thanks for the look.


[img]https://i.imgur.com/qq9poUT.jpg[/img]


[img]https://i.imgur.com/Yuety21.jpg[/img]
I’ll take it for 45. PM or email me at [url]jamesmckee2018@gmail.com[/url] and I will pay immediately.   Thank You!
